sentence: Ralph Lauren CorporationRL is slated to report its fourth-quarter fiscal 2015 results on May 13, before the opening bell.
In the last quarter, the company delivered a negative surprise of 4.37%.
Let's see how things are shaping up for this announcement.

Following the lower-than-anticipated third-quarter fiscal 2015, the company provided a mid single-digit rate revenue outlook for fourth-quarter fiscal 2015, on a constant currency basis, which is expected to include a 550 bps negative impact from currency translations.
Also, Ralph Lauren continues to incur high expenses related to the increased investments made to support its long-term growth strategies.
These factors may impact results.
However, management believes that its results so far in the year highlight its focus on long-term objectives.
The company intends to stay fixed on its goal by undertaking significant investments, introducing new stores and making the correct organizational alterations.
Our proven model does not conclusively show that Ralph Lauren is likely to beat earnings this quarter.
This is because a stock needs to have both a positive Earnings ESP and a Zacks Rank #1, 2 or 3 for this to happen.

This is not the case here, as you will see below:

Zacks ESP: Earnings ESP for Ralph Lauren is currently pegged at -1.52%.
This is because the Most Accurate estimate of $1.30 is below the Zacks Consensus Estimate of $1.32.
Zacks Rank: Ralph Lauren's Zacks Rank #3 (Hold) when combined with a negative ESP makes surprise prediction difficult.
We caution against stocks with a Zacks Ranks #4 and #5 (Sell-rated stocks) going into the earnings announcement, especially when the company is seeing negative estimate revisions.

Here are some companies you may want to consider as our model shows that these have the right combination of elements to post an earnings beat this quarter:

American Eagle Outfitters Inc. AEO has an Earnings ESP of +9.09% and a Zacks Rank #2 (Buy).
Urban Outfitters Inc. URBN has an Earnings ESP of +3.33% and a Zacks Rank #2.
The Home Depot Inc. HD has an Earnings ESP of +2.61% and a Zacks Rank #3.
